name: League of Elibe
declaringWar: I do not wish for it to come to this, but your existence threatens the safety of our people. Prepare for war!
attacked: We do not fear you, for all of us have faced even greater threats than you!
defeated: Father, Lilina... Please forgive me, for I have failed you all.
neutralNo: We kindly refuse your humble offer.
afterPeace: It is great to hear that you seek peace as well. War is terrible for our people anyway. Let us continue this for an enternity, shall we?
tradeRequest: We are interested to have an exchange with you.
uniqueText: +3 Science and +5 Production from Antiquity Sites
